00045 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_LITWATCH_H
00046 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_LITWATCH_H
00047 
00048 template<typename VarArray, typename ValueArray, typename VarSum>
00049 struct LiteralSumConstraintDynamic : public AbstractConstraint
00050 {
00051   virtual string constraint_name()
00052   { return "LiteralSumDynamic"; }
00053   
00054  typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00055   
00056   VarArray var_array;
00057   ValueArray value_array;
00058   MemOffset unwatched_indexes;
00059   int last;
00060   int num_unwatched;
00061     
00062   int& unwatched(int i)
00063   { return static_cast<int*>(unwatched_indexes.get_ptr())[i]; }
00064   
00065   VarSum var_sum;
00066   
00067   LiteralSumConstraintDynamic(StateObj* _stateObj,const VarArray& _var_array, ValueArray _val_array, VarSum _var_sum) :
00068     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var_array(_var_array), value_array(_val_array), var_sum(_var_sum)
00069   {   
00070       int array_size = var_array.size();
00071       
00072       num_unwatched = array_size - var_sum - 1 ;
00073       if(num_unwatched < 0)
00074           num_unwatched=0;
00075       if(num_unwatched > var_array.size()) num_unwatched=var_array.size();
00076       
00077       unwatched_indexes = getMemory(stateObj).nonBackTrack().request_bytes(sizeof(unsigned) * num_unwatched);
00078       // above line might request 0 bytes
00079       last = 0;
00080   }
00081   
00082   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00083   {
00084     if(var_sum <= 0)
00085       return 0;
00086     if(var_sum > var_array.size())
00087       return var_array.size() + 1;
00088     return var_sum + 1;
00089   }
00090     
00091   virtual void full_propagate()
00092   {
00093     if(var_sum <= 0)
00094       return;
00095       
00096     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00097     
00098     int array_size = var_array.size(); 
00099     int triggers_wanted = var_sum + 1;
00100     int index;
00101     
00102     for(index = 0; (index < array_size) && (triggers_wanted > 0); ++index) 
00103     {
00104       if(var_array[index].inDomain(value_array[index]))              
00105       {
00106         // delay setting up triggers in case we don't need to
00107         --triggers_wanted;
00108       }
00109     }       
00110     
00111     D_ASSERT(triggers_wanted >= 0);
00112     
00113     if(triggers_wanted > 1)    // Then we have failed, forget it.
00114     {
00115       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00116       return;
00117     }
00118     else if(triggers_wanted == 1)      // Then we can propagate 
00119     {                               // We never even set up triggers
00120       for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00121       {
00122         if(var_array[i].inDomain(value_array[i]))
00123         {
00124           var_array[i].propagateAssign(value_array[i]);
00125         }
00126       }
00127     }
00128     else                                // Now set up triggers
00129     {
00130       D_ASSERT(triggers_wanted == 0);
00131       
00132       int j = 0;
00133       
00134       // We only look at the elements of vararray that we looked at before
00135       // Exactly triggers_wanted of them have the val in their domain.
00136       
00137       for(int i = 0; (i < index); ++i)   // remember index was the elts we looked at
00138       { 
00139         if(var_array[i].inDomain(value_array[i]))
00140         {
00141           dt->trigger_info() = i;
00142           var_array[i].addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, value_array[i]);
00143           ++dt;
00144         }
00145         else
00146         {
00147           unwatched(j) = i;
00148           ++j;
00149           // When run at root we could optimise as follows
00150           //    If VarToCount not in domain then do not put j in unwatched
00151           //      Instead decrement num_unwatched
00152         }
00153       }
00154       
00155       for(int i = index; i < array_size; ++i)
00156       {
00157         unwatched(j) = i;
00158         ++j;
00159       }
00160       
00161       D_ASSERT(j == num_unwatched);
00162     }
00163     return;
00164   }
00165   
00167   //
00168   //  NOT updated for new type of watched data structure
00169   //  
00170   BOOL check_consistency()
00171   { return true; }
00172   
00173   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00174   {
00175     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(DynLitWatch);
00176     D_ASSERT(check_consistency());
00177     int propval = dt->trigger_info();
00178 
00179     D_ASSERT(!var_array[propval].inDomain(value_array[propval]));
00180     
00181     BOOL found_new_support = false;
00182     
00183     int j = 0;
00184     
00185     for(int loop = 0 ; (!found_new_support) && loop < num_unwatched ; )
00186     {
00187       D_ASSERT(num_unwatched > 0);
00188       
00189       j = (last+1+loop) % num_unwatched; 
00190       if(var_array[unwatched(j)].inDomain(value_array[unwatched(j)]))
00191       {
00192         found_new_support = true;
00193       }
00194       // XXX What is going on here? check in dynamic_sum!
00195       {
00196         ++loop;
00197       } 
00198     }
00199     
00200     if (found_new_support)         // so we have found a new literal to watch
00201     {
00202       int& unwatched_index = unwatched(j);
00203       
00204       // propval gives array index of old watched lit
00205       
00206       dt->trigger_info() = unwatched_index;
00207       var_array[unwatched_index].addDynamicTrigger(dt,DomainRemoval,
00208                                                    value_array[unwatched_index]); 
00209       
00210       unwatched_index = propval;       
00211       last = j;
00212       return;
00213     }
00214     
00215     
00216     // there is no literal to watch, we need to propagate
00217     
00218     DynamicTrigger* dt2 = dynamic_trigger_start();
00219     
00220     for(int z = 0; z < var_sum + 1; ++z)
00221     {
00222       if(dt != dt2)       // that one has just been set the other way
00223       {
00224         var_array[dt2->trigger_info()].propagateAssign(value_array[dt2->trigger_info()]);
00225       }
00226       dt2++;
00227     }
00228   }
00229   
00230   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00231   {
00232     D_ASSERT(v_size == var_array.size());
00233     int count = 0;
00234     for(int i = 0; i < v_size; ++i)
00235       count += (v[i] == value_array[i]);
00236     return count >= var_sum;
00237   }
00238   
00239   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00240   { 
00241     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00242     vars.reserve(var_array.size());
00243     for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00244       vars.push_back(AnyVarRef(var_array[i]));
00245     return vars;  
00246   }
00247   
00248   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00249   {
00250       if(var_sum<=0) return true;
00251       
00252     for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00253     {
00254       if(var_array[i].inDomain(value_array[i]))
00255       {
00256         assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, value_array[i]));
00257         return true;
00258       }
00259     }
00260     return false;
00261   }
00262   
00263 };
00264 
00265 template<typename VarArray,  typename ValArray, typename VarSum>
00266 AbstractConstraint*
00267 LiteralSumConDynamic(StateObj* stateObj,const VarArray& _var_array,  const ValArray& _val_array, VarSum _var_sum)
00268 { return new LiteralSumConstraintDynamic<VarArray,ValArray,VarSum>(stateObj, _var_array, _val_array, _var_sum); }
00269 
00270 template<typename T1>
00271 AbstractConstraint* 
00272 BuildCT_WATCHED_LITSUM(StateObj* stateObj,const T1& t1, ConstraintBlob& b)
00273 {
00274   D_ASSERT(b.constants[1].size());
00275   return LiteralSumConDynamic(stateObj, t1, b.constants[0], runtime_val(b.constants[1][0])); 
00276 }

00278 #endif
